antichess
Class GameWriter

java.lang.Object
  antichess.GameWriter

public class GameWriter
extends Object

The GameWriter writes ChessBoard objects out to XML files.

Specification Fields
  • board : Board // The Board as of when the game was saved
  • whiteTimer : Timer // White's Timer as of when the game was saved
  • blackTimer : Timer // Black's Timer as of when the game was saved
